title: Ad-blocking ‘YouTube Vanced’ will be ‘discontinued’ over legal reasons
content:
YouTube Premium is how you’re officially supposed to watch videos without ads so that Creators continue to earn revenue from their work. An effort has long existed to get around paying for the ad-free subscription, but “YouTube Vanced” is now shutting down.

more…

The post Ad-blocking ‘YouTube Vanced’ will be ‘discontinued’ over legal reasons appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: An ethically questionable effort has long existed to get around paying for ad-free YouTube Premium, but "Vanced" is now shutting down...
